alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Schleicher; Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 3:09PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SCHLEICHER... SOUTHEASTERN CROCKETT AND NORTHWESTERN SUTTON COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM CDT... At 309 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of I-10 Near The Crockett-Sutton County Line, or 9 miles east of Ozona, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ozona, The Intersection Of Highway 163 And Ranch Road 1973, and I-10 Near The Crockett-Sutton County Line. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 366 and 387. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
